education.activities: Suffolk MBA begin its program of study with businesses simulation, role-playing decision-makers in global companies faced with critical and often competing challenges across all business areas. The MBAs approach the core courses with new insights into how decisions in marketing affect operations, production, financial forecasting, and the flow and management of information.In 2009, the Princeton Review ranked Sawyer Business School among the top 15 best Global Management programs in the US.
